title: Georgia is at a crossroads in global AI race, here’s how state can thrive

content:

title: AI useful but dangerous if misused, says Chief Justice
description: KUALA LUMPUR: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is like a chainsaw, useful in the right hands but extremely dangerous in the wrong ones, says Chief Justice Datuk Seri Wan Ahmad Farid Wan Salleh.
content:

title: Kevin O'Leary Warns Real Threat Is AI, Not Nukes, As Trump Orders First US Nuclear Test Since 1992 To Counter Russia, China
description: As Donald Trump revives U.S. nuclear testing after three decades, Kevin O'Leary warns that artificial intelligence—not atomic weapons—will determine global military power in the future.
content:
